title.text: FORGe at SemEval-2017 Task 9: Deep sentence generation based on a sequence of graph transducers

abstractContent.text: We present the contribution of Universitat Pompeu Fabra's NLP group to the Sem-Eval Task 9.2 (AMR-to-English Generation).

The proposed generation pipeline comprises: (i) a series of rule-based graph-transducers for the syntacticization of the input graphs and the resolution of morphological agreements, and (ii) an off-the-shelf statistical linearization component.

tableCaptions.text: Table 1: Overview of the AMR-to-text pipeline.
